name: Glade-iators
description:
Description:
Glade-iators is a fantasy world with tree-people fighting to the death in the corpse of one of their ancient ancestors while wielding weapons and wearing armour made from the bones of their enemies. The crowd is not easily appeased in these fights, and will not be until only one Glade-iator is left standing. They want to see all of their leaves fall, and have one turned into a pile of firewood.

Gameplay:
2v2 souls-like combat dueling game with an influential crowd.
